content: to add drape to your finished fabric pick up the edge stitches along what will be the bottom edge when worn and work a decorative border this would also be a good way to widen the wrap after it s finished if you decide it s too narrow © copyright 2012 cheryl schumer all rights reserved this pattern is free for personal non-commercial use only same thing only different v1 0 page 5 of 5 copyright 2012 - cheryl schumer
